name: RubyHunters Demo
description:
IMPORTANT: The game only has the controls screen for controller. Keyboard and mouse controls are as follow:

WASD: Move around

Space: Jump

Left/Right Arrows: Camera

Rubyhunters is a 3D platformer and collecting game reminiscent of old games such as Banjo Kazooie. This demo includes one level with 5 collectables. It is currently built for a controller, but can also be played with a keyboard.
